---
title: 图片
description: 图片组件用于显示带有备用内容的图片。
---

import { Image } from "@resolid/react-ui";
import { mergeFrontmatter } from "../__utils";
import { BlurhashCanvas } from "~/components/blurhash-canvas";
import { ComponentProps } from "../__components";

export const meta = mergeFrontmatter(frontmatter);

# {frontmatter.title}

{frontmatter.description}

## 导入

```js
import { Image } from "@resolid/react-ui";
```

## 基础

图片的属性与HTML图像元素的属性相同，可以在 [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/img#attributes) 中找到。

图片的样式可以使用非常灵活的 [Tailwind CSS](https://tailwindcss.com) 进行自定义。

<section className={'example group'}>
  <div className={'p-3 not-prose rounded-t border grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-4 gap-3'}>
      <Image fallback={<BlurhashCanvas
        aspect={2/3}
        width={192}
        height={128}
        hash={'oJKl?HS}8wIupJR%%LI=i_sot6xY4Tso_N$|IUnmD%n%x]WoRjS5Y6NdIAahxaoI-ns,rrs.j]WV'}
      />} className={'w-auto'} src={'https://file.resolid.tech/images%2F01.jpg'} />
    <Image fallback={<BlurhashCanvas
      aspect={2/3}
      width={192}
      height={128}
      hash={'o9Cr_.R%03R.}r=__NxYVtNIJAt6IU%2j]9uoL$%D%X9tQr=RjR+IpR*xt%1RkNHS$n$s9S$ofxE'}
    />} className={'w-auto rounded'} src={'https://file.resolid.tech/images%2F02.jpg'} />
    <Image fallback={<BlurhashCanvas
      aspect={2/3}
      width={192}
      height={128}
      hash={'o23b]@?wwEtRsiR$H=DhI9Rij[ac$^%itnV?WFn*RjROkCo#jsf,t3ogV[RiWAfSMwWUo#ofozj['}
    />} className={'w-auto rounded-lg'} src={'https://file.resolid.tech/images%2F03.jpg'} />
    <Image fallback={<BlurhashCanvas
      aspect={2/3}
      width={192}
      height={128}
      hash={'o03kjBT|9UR4KtO*33kErVnOs7X2DZm+x+%LrpnB:QrZF{KjOHwMKj%3$$NInmkVXcORNG;3$1K4'}
    />} className={'w-auto rounded'} src={'https://file.resolid.tech/images%2F04.jpg'} />
    <Image fallback={<BlurhashCanvas
      aspect={2/3}
      width={192}
      height={128}
      hash={'o7G8=r00x[tS8_D%_19Y9FxZWC%M00%L_49F-;tR00~q?aS6_3D%JA%29F%LIpsl?vNHITD%ROkD'}
    />} className={'w-auto rounded'} src={'https://file.resolid.tech/images%2F05.jpg'} />
    <Image fallback={<BlurhashCanvas
      aspect={2/3}
      width={192}
      height={128}
      hash={'o7G8=r00x[tS8_D%_19Y9FxZWC%M00%L_49F-;tR00~q?aS6_3D%JA%29F%LIpsl?vNHITD%ROkD'}
    />} className={'w-auto rounded blur-sm'} src={'https://file.resolid.tech/images%2F05.jpg'} />
    <Image fallback={<BlurhashCanvas
      aspect={2/3}
      width={192}
      height={128}
      hash={'o7G8=r00x[tS8_D%_19Y9FxZWC%M00%L_49F-;tR00~q?aS6_3D%JA%29F%LIpsl?vNHITD%ROkD'}
    />} className={'w-auto rounded sepia'} src={'https://file.resolid.tech/images%2F05.jpg'} />
    <Image fallback={<BlurhashCanvas
      aspect={2/3}
      width={192}
      height={128}
      hash={'o7G8=r00x[tS8_D%_19Y9FxZWC%M00%L_49F-;tR00~q?aS6_3D%JA%29F%LIpsl?vNHITD%ROkD'}
    />} className={'w-auto rounded grayscale'} src={'https://file.resolid.tech/images%2F05.jpg'} />
  </div>

```jsx
<Image className={'w-auto'} src={'https://file.resolid.tech/images%2F01.jpg'} />
<Image className={'w-auto rounded'} src={'https://file.resolid.tech/images%2F02.jpg'} />
<Image className={'w-auto rounded-lg'} src={'https://file.resolid.tech/images%2F03.jpg'} />
<Image className={'w-auto rounded'} src={'https://file.resolid.tech/images%2F04.jpg'} />
<Image className={'w-auto rounded'} src={'https://file.resolid.tech/images%2F05.jpg'} />
<Image className={'w-auto rounded blur-sm'} src={'https://file.resolid.tech/images%2F05.jpg'} />
<Image className={'w-auto rounded sepia'} src={'https://file.resolid.tech/images%2F05.jpg'} />
<Image className={'w-auto rounded grayscale'} src={'https://file.resolid.tech/images%2F05.jpg'} />
```

</section>

## 备用

<section className={'example group'}>
  <div className={'p-3 not-prose rounded-t border grid grid-cols-4 gap-3'}>
    <Image
      className={'w-auto'}
      fallback={'https://img.temp.im/199x132'}
      src={'https://file.resolid.tech/images/012.jpg'}
    />
    <Image
      className={'w-auto'}
      fallback={
        <div className={'flex h-auto w-auto items-center justify-center border border-bd-normal bg-bg-subtlest text-fg-subtlest'}>
          加载失败
        </div>
      }
      src={'https://file.resolid.tech/images/012.jpg'}
    />
    <Image
      className={'w-auto'}
      fallback={'data:image/png;base64,'}
      src={'https://file.resolid.tech/images/012.jpg'}
    />
  </div>

```jsx
<Image
  className={'w-auto'}
  fallback={'https://img.temp.im/199x132'}
  src={'https://file.resolid.tech/images/012.jpg'}
/>
<Image
  className={'w-auto'}
  fallback={
    <div className={'flex h-auto w-auto items-center justify-center border border-bd-normal bg-bg-subtlest text-fg-subtlest'}>
      加载失败
    </div>
  }
  src={'https://file.resolid.tech/images/012.jpg'}
/>
<Image
  className={'w-auto'}
  fallback={'data:image/png;base64,'}
  src={'https://file.resolid.tech/images/012.jpg'}
/>
```

</section>

## 属性

<ComponentProps componentFile={"./image/image.tsx"} />
